shadowspy, mkv files can be played on a PS3. It requires the program PS3 Media Server, a computer to stream the video from, and networking with cables instead of using wireless.

@shadowspy - Don't listen to TruSinner, just download a Java-based PS3 media server app (Google it!) and you can stream MKV's and almost everything over your network to your PS3 except a few Cinavia protected files.
@Pro2Type You can uses PS3 Media Server without cables, it works just fine over wireless networks too!
